title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7428.1 - Policy
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7428.1 - Policy

State Regulations
(a) Consistent with
the requirements of this Part, the Office of Children and Family Services
(OCFS) shall require that each secure facility provide all residents with
regular access to library services. (b) OCFS shall develop written policies and
procedures that govern library services at each secure facility. The written
policies and procedures shall be reviewed annually and updated as
needed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7428.1

Renumbered from subtitle AA of chapter III
New

York State Register April 11, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 15, eff. 4/11/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
